channel.title: commands on One Problem Solved
channel.description: Recent content in commands on One Problem Solved

item.title: Git Commands
item.description: My Commonly-Used Git Commands Shortcut Description git status Show whether the local checkout is in sync with the remote. git pull Get latest changes from the repo. git add Add the changed file to the commit git push Make a local commit. git push remote Make a remote commit git ls-tree –full-tree -r HEAD Show files in repo.

item.title: Dotnet Core Commands
item.description: My Commonly-Used Commands Shortcut Description dotnet run Builds and runs the application dotnet run –no-build Run without building

item.title: Hugo Commands
item.description: My Commonly-Used Hugo Commands Command Description hugo new post/my-post.md Create a new post hugo server Start hugo server hugo server -D Start hugo server and include draft posts hugo Build site for publishing

item.title: Powershell Commands
item.description: My Commonly-Used Powershell Commands Command Description Get-ChildItem -name -recurse *.file_name.* Find files
